text.div:
PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 4

This value set provide an example of possible codes representing concepts that may be associated to PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 4. PhPID Lvl3 identifies Substance(s) Term, Strength, Reference Strength and Administrable Dose Form in the medication product. It is envisioned that IDMP PhPIDs will be used in the next future.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    374647008Amoxicillin 875 mg oral tablet
  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    CodeDisplay
    392259005'Amoxicillin 875 mg and clavulanate potassium 125 mg oral tablet

name: Pharmaceutical Products (Lvl 4)
